This feature uses a third-party service to determine your public IP address. When enabled, a request will be sent to an external service every time a sequence is launched. This service is not controlled by this app. Do you want to proceed? Sequence List Launch any sequence from home screen Empty sequence list Unknown event Knock \'%1$s\' [%2$s] (%3$s‚Üí%4$s) Network connection not available Sequence \'%s\': invalid host Unable to resolve %1$s: %2$s Empty sequence \'%s\' Unknown error: %s Saved sequence \'%s\' Deleted sequence \'%s\' Export to %1$s (%2$s sequences) Import from %1$s (%2$s sequences) Export to %1$s: %2$s Import from %1$s: %2$s Error: %s Value is empty Value should be between %1$d and %2$d Value should be a number Custom IP Header Size Specify the IP header size on your network IPv4 Header Size %d bytes Resource Check Interval %d second %d seconds Warning! ‚ö†Ô∏è Proceed with caution!

This setting allows you to specify the IP header size used in your network.

Important notes:

‚Ä¢ This does NOT modify the actual header size ‚Äî it only informs the app about your network‚Äôs configuration.
‚Ä¢ Misconfiguration may cause the app to behave incorrectly.
‚Ä¢ Adjust this only if you‚Äôre certain your network uses non-standard IP headers (e.g., custom VPNs, legacy systems).

For most users: do not change this setting. I Understand ICMP Packet Total Size ‚Ä¢ IPv4: %1$d bytes (IP header ‚Äî %2$d, ICMP header ‚Äî %3$d, data ‚Äî %4$d) ‚Ä¢ IPv6: %1$d bytes (IP header ‚Äî %2$d, ICMP header ‚Äî %3$d, data ‚Äî %4$d) Discord Server A place where I pretend to work. https://discord.com/invite/AXT5dXkjEQ Group URL Beta Version This beta version adds the ability to link a sequence to an external resource. If necessary, the application can monitor the availability of this resource. I will be grateful for feedback, suggestions and any bugs found. Feedback is accepted on GitHub, email or Discord - all contacts can be found in the ‚ÄúAbout‚Äù section.
